DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety new preservative lubricant eye drop use four time day healthy adult subject diagnose dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Evaluation New Preservative Lubricating Eye Drop
DOC.detailed_description: Single-site , open-labeled study . Twenty two subject enrol healthy adult group twenty two subject dry eye group . Each subject study approximately 2 week ( treatment ) see three study Visits : Visit 1 ( Day 0 , Baseline ) , Visit 2 ( Day 7 +/- 1 ) Visit 3 ( Day 14 +/- 1 ) . Dosing regimen 1-2 drop eye , four time daily , two week . Assessments comprise visual acuity , slit lamp biomicroscopy , fluorescein corneal staining , product comfort .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Able follow study instruction attend require study visit Provide write informed consent Visual health eye comfort within protocolspecified parameter Women childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test screening , breastfeeding , agree use protocolspecified acceptable form birth control throughout study Any medical condition history , ocular score , use drug , device medication , per protocol opinion investigator , might compromise safety subject analysis study result . Use contact lens outside protocol allowance Selfreported pregnancy , positive urine pregnancy test , breastfeeding ; intend become pregnant breastfeed duration study , refuse protocolspecified urine pregnancy test , and/or use protocolspecified birth control method agree continue duration study . Participated investigational drug device trial within 30 day enter study .
